price: Onima koji ne vjeruju pripada patnja žestoka, a onima koji vjeruju i dobra djela čine pripada oprost i nagrada velika.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
